DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of live video-colposcopy on womenÂ´s anxiety.
DOC.brief_title: Video Colposcopy in Women With Dysplasia
DOC.criteria: women referred for colposcopy due to cervical abnormalities We included women if they attended colposcopy for the first time pregnant women presence of a language barrier known anxiety disorder or depression history of conization or other treatments known oncological disorder inadequate colposcopy
